participant_1.background:
I am not honest about my relationship with my girlfriend.
i want to be a movie director when i grow up.
I like to use my creativity to make unique and interesting items from thrift shop finds.
My family is supportive of my endeavors to work puzzles and change the world.
I am a good mother, but I need to learn to treat my girlfriend better.

participant_2.background:
I am excited to start my new job at McDonald's.
I had to learn how to cook without shrimp because of my shellfish allergy.
i like to play guitar.
i take things very literally.
i am in the navy.

content.text: Hello! What are you doing tonight?
I am about to start my new job at McDonald's!
Oh wow, that's exciting! What made you want to work there?
I've always loved working with food, and I love the idea of being able to serve people delicious food. I also really like the company culture and the values that they stand for.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thank you! I'm really excited to get started.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to play guitar, and I also enjoy spending time with my family and friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've always wanted to learn how to play guitar.
You should! It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I might just have to do that.
I'm sure you'd be great at it.
No problem! So, what are you looking forward to the most about your new job?
I'm looking forward to meeting new people and learning new things. I'm also excited to be able to serve people delicious food and make their day a little brighter.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll do great. I'm looking forward to hearing all about it when you start.
Thanks! I'll be sure to let you know.
